cms_block.title: Block category Dogs Food
Block advert details
Faqs
cms_block.content:
Question: what if my cat ingests revolution?
Answer: For cats the revolution should be applied to skin directly between the shoulder blades or on the skin at the back of the head where your pet is unable to reach. If there are multiple pets who groom each other, they will need to be separated until the product is completely dry. In the even of an accidental ingestions, please contact your veterinarian right away.

Question: Does this works with dogs?
Answer: Revolution is available for use in dogs as Revolution canine. It is available in doses based on your dogs weight.

Question: What if vet has his own pharmacy? and won't let me purchase this product unless it is thru his pharmacy. I have made a copy of the prescription can I
Answer: We need the original prescription and cannot use a copy unless verbally authorized.
If you give our customer service a call , we will be happy to give you names of veterinarians who
like to work with us and will happily give you a script.

Question: Will this help grass allergies & dog licking feet?
Answer: My English Bull Terrier has terrible allergies and licks her feet, between her toes mostly, constantly. We started her on Omega 3 and it has helped a lot. The pills are inexpensive and worth giving a try. Hope this helps!

Question: It says give 1 pill to 50 lbs.
Answer: Since each soft gel tablet is for dogs up to 50 lbs, they could each take one tablet daily as that will fit all dogs and cats between 1-50lbs

Delivery
cms_block.content:
Free Next Day UK Delivery – Orders Over £99


Place your order online before 2pm Monday to Friday and choose Next Day delivery, and we’ll deliver your order by Parcelforce the very next working day.
If your order is less than £99, next day delivery costs just £5.99.
Available for in stock orders and to most UK mainland addresses.

 

Free Standard UK Delivery – Orders Over £49


Standard Delivery normally takes 3-5 working days and your parcel will usually arrive by either Royal Mail or Parcelforce, depending on the size and weight of the order.
If your order is less than £49, Standard Delivery costs just £3.99.
We can also offer other delivery options including
•Next Working Day AM - £7.99
•Saturday AM - £9.99
Please note, the expected delivery times above exclude Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays.
Large items such as Cages and some Stands are only available for delivery to UK Mainland addresses and may take an extra few days or be subject to surcharge in some areas. For more information on delivery charges and speeds to the UK and International addresses, and any restrictions, please see our full Delivery Information

cms_block.title: Faqs
cms_block.content:
Question: what if my cat ingests revolution?


Answer: For cats the revolution should be applied to skin directly between the shoulder blades or on the skin at the back of the head where your pet is unable to reach. If there are multiple pets who groom each other, they will need to be separated until the product is completely dry. In the even of an accidental ingestions, please contact your veterinarian right away.



Question: Does this works with dogs?


Answer: Revolution is available for use in dogs as Revolution canine. It is available in doses based on your dogs weight.



Question: What if vet has his own pharmacy? and won't let me purchase this product unless it is thru his pharmacy. I have made a copy of the prescription can I


Answer: We need the original prescription and cannot use a copy unless verbally authorized.
If you give our customer service a call , we will be happy to give you names of veterinarians who
like to work with us and will happily give you a script.



Question: Will this help grass allergies & dog licking feet?


Answer: My English Bull Terrier has terrible allergies and licks her feet, between her toes mostly, constantly. We started her on Omega 3 and it has helped a lot. The pills are inexpensive and worth giving a try. Hope this helps!



Question: It says give 1 pill to 50 lbs.


Answer: Since each soft gel tablet is for dogs up to 50 lbs, they could each take one tablet daily as that will fit all dogs and cats between 1-50lbs

cms_block.content:
